Positive_reviews: Feather duvets and plenty of healthy foods for breakfast
Negative_reviews: The banter of the check-in staff - I don't need to be asked a lot of inane questions about how I plan to spend my time etc.
Title: Central location, quiet room, feather duvets, pool and sauna, great breakfast

Negative_reviews: Had to wait a while to be seated for breakfast.
Title: Wonderful

Positive_reviews: Loved the location - near EVERYTHING. The hotel itself was beautiful as well. And the views were breathtaking.
Title: Great Stay

Positive_reviews: The location, the quality of the room decor, the size and comfort of the beds and the friendly professional staff.
Negative_reviews: The corridor decor was too gloomy and dark for my preference.
Title: Wonderful hotel in an amazing location.

Positive_reviews: Location and friendliness
Negative_reviews: The view wasn’t exactly pleasant
Title: Very Good

Positive_reviews: Rooms were extremely comfortable. Staff were helpful. The area is fantastic!
Title: Amazing.

Positive_reviews:
Spacious rooms, with great beds. 
The staff were superb
Negative_reviews: Breakfast was great, maybe add more variety.
Title: EXCELLENT

Positive_reviews: Bedden en ruime kamer, bathroom fine with safe  seport. Anti slip
Negative_reviews:
Tv kabel ingewikkeld, no hairdraier, no minibar.
Room ok not special cosy
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Breakfast excellent. Bed comfy, bathroom clean. Concierge went to extra lengths to supply our request.
Negative_reviews: No ice available for cooling drinks - we had to ask especially for it. Facewashers not provided.
Title: Enjoyable and very convenient, if expensive.

Positive_reviews: The location could not be better. Room superb (556), good shower, good breakfast.  Good parking , easy to find
Negative_reviews: Very tight-fisted with the coffee in the room: we paid for a deluxe room (which was very good) but only two measly sachets of coffee. I got more from porter but they were not replenished next night. The only disappointment
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Excellent location in the centre of Edinburgh. Speedy check in and out, clean comfortable rooms. Good selection of bread, pastries and spreads at breakfast.
Negative_reviews: There was a wide variety of cooked food at breakfast but very little fresh fruit. Despite it being the height of summer there were no strawberries, raspberries or bluberries, only a fruit salad in syrup.
Title: I have stayed at this hotel a number of times and always found the service to be very good.

Positive_reviews: Prime location! Just in the middle of Royal mile, between the Edinburgh Castle, Old Town, New Centre, & Palace of Holyrood. Beds were comfy. Staff were friendly. All within walking distance. They gave us free brownies & ice cream. Fringe shows were playing in the premises. The hotel in itself is like an old castle!
Negative_reviews: Main issue was not getting a twin bed in the beginning but eventually the bed was altered to twin bed. Was slightly noisy during night time. The price was a bit high.
Title: Excellent

Negative_reviews: While most things in the hotel were good, the place smells. I think it is the carpet - which desperately needs to be replaced. Too bad because the rest of the stay was great.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Great location great room and facilities
Negative_reviews: Everything was great couldn't fault it
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Fantastic location
Negative_reviews: Fire alarms went off twice while we stayed there and we were left standing on the street at 1.30am in 8C in our pyjamas.  My friend was so terrified that she didn’t have shoes on.  The staff were thoughtful enough to give out slippers.  They did provide letters of apology
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The staff were friendly, happy and all around a pleasure.
Negative_reviews: It wasn’t really a big problem but due to the smaller size of the pool it could be hard to swim when there were children in also
Title: Exceptional

Positive_reviews: Staff tried their best but atmosphere was miserable due to current restrictions
Negative_reviews: Poor breakfast, limited choice, worst cooked breakfast ever , cold and badly cooked.
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: The room was spacious, the bed was really comfortable and we had a lovely view.  Also, as it was a special occasion for us, they upgraded us and we had a bottle of bubbly in the room which was a nice touch!   Due to COVID and the local restaurants being closed at night, we had to eat in the restaurant each evening and although it was a reduced menu, the meals were excellent.  The location of the hotel was perfect for what we wanted to see in Edinburgh.  The staff were also very attentive and helpful.
Negative_reviews:
Apparently (due to COVID restrictions) they were unable to play music in the restaurant/at breakfast which really took away any atmosphere, especially as there were so few guests.
Service at breakfast was a bit too quick - each morning we were still eating our cereal/fruit when the cooked meal arrived!
The rooms could do with a lick of paint, plus the towels were a bit ragged!
Title: Good value, comfortable hotel in a good location.

Positive_reviews:
The location is great - right in the centre of Edinburgh's old town so good if you'd like to walk to the Castle, Princes Street Gardens etc. The standard room is nice and spacious, has everything you need (towels, toiletries, tea and coffee with small kettle, bottles of water, desk and coffee table, television) and the bathroom had a bathtub. 
The staff at the Melrose Spa were wonderful, the facilities were clean and safe for Covid-19 measures, the pool was warm and empty, and we had a great neck, shoulder and back massage.
Negative_reviews:
The room did show signs of age - the furniture was a little rough around the edges, the metal backing of the bed had quite a lot of scuffs that just made the room look less polished. The shower screen was a little loose although it did the job. It wasn't possible to screencast to the TV which was a bit of a shame. 
Entrance to the hotel from the car park did feel a little strange as the signs were not very clear and everything looks a bit bare and stark.
Reception staff were a little exasperated on arrival but we understood that working in hospitality is difficult during times like this.
Title: Excellent location for a quick trip to Edinburgh

Positive_reviews: Breakfast was good, nice staff
Negative_reviews: First impression from car park was not good. Room looked tired, headboard was very scratched and marked.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The staff were all friendly and helpful.  The parking facility attached to the hotel was the reason for my booking and it worked perfectly.
Negative_reviews: I booked a twin room, but was given a double.  I didn't complain due to all the extra cleaning required by Coronavirus, but it wasn't ideal as I was travelling with my teenager.  The headboard was badly marked with the heads of previous occupants!
Title: The central location and parking was important for me as I was travelling with a wheelchair user.

Positive_reviews: The staff were friendly, the room was huge. The breakfast was great, plenty of choice and the kids loved the pancake machine.
Negative_reviews:
The surfaces in the room were dirty and sticky, red wine spills and big stain on the carpet. Thankfully, surface wipes and sanitiser was provided so I was able to clean before we unpacked. 
We had pre booked a table in the hotel restaurant before arrival. We didn’t select the time, it was allocated to us. When we arrived for our table at 7pm we were advised that we wouldn’t be able to sit in the restaurant as we had children and they are not allowed in the restaurant after 8pm, (it would have been good to know this in advance). They offered us a table in the corridor by the gents toilets. We politely declined. Thankfully, Prezzo, just across the road were more welcoming.
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: The breakfast was very good with a lot of choice. The location was excellent very central to all the tourist attractions, shops, bars and restaurants. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Good parking facilities.
Negative_reviews: Rooms are a little tired and dated could do with a revamp. The housekeeping could do with a little more attention to detail as we found some dirty and dust. We weren’t provided with any shower gel in our room but there was other toiletries. Possibly ever so slightly over priced in my opinion.
Title: Overall good, great location and good facilities with extremely helpful members of staff.

Positive_reviews: Situation of hotel ,cleanliness very modern in hotel in adjoining bar young stall excellent an taking every caution in this pandemic,lovely lace to stay
Negative_reviews: When couldn't get slot in pool an spa ,an signing in one membe was a bit offish all othe staff Amazing  ,no Sean s in foyer
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Parking was limited but when you found a space it was ideal
Negative_reviews: No hot water, bar queue was ridiculous
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews:
The entrance was lovely
Nice staff on desk
Negative_reviews:
We wasn’t allowed to use gym or swim after them saying we could. 
Scratched head boards dirty bathrooms. 
Room cards are a disaster up and down with a small baby getting new cards made. 
A member of staff entered our room at 3:00AM I woke up and they slammed our door shut and scared me to death they said he was changing bedding who changes bedding at 3:00AM. 
We will not be staying here again 
As nice as the staff on desk was it was a nightmare.
Title: Really disappointed

Positive_reviews: Good Central Location
Negative_reviews: No hot water for one entire day of my two day stay
Title: Disappointing

Positive_reviews: Loved the location of the hotel, we got a free upgrade which was lovely.
Negative_reviews: Windows were very thin and could hear everything going on in the street got woken up a couple times  but a very comfy bed
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Cleanliness was good,
Negative_reviews: Hairdryer poor
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: Mattress had to be changed after first night...most uncomfortable night’s sleep I’ve ever had in a hotel...matters was part it’s best. No compensation given or offered.
Title: Poor

Positive_reviews: Nice room with a good view. The location of the hotel is superb.
Negative_reviews:
They did a lot to prevent the spread of Covid, however they didn't do all the steps, e.g the TV remote wasn't bagged as it was explained on the information sheet.
There is no room service because of Covid but I had to ask 3 different staff members to figure this out and all of them said something contradictory.
Title: Nice hotel but the service is inconsistent

Positive_reviews: Brilliant location and amazing bed!
Negative_reviews: Took quite a while to clear plates/bottles from outside rooms

Title: Good, although prices for alcohol in Edinburgh bars are too expensive. A rip-off to be honest

Positive_reviews:
Very good Location!
Like the indoor swimming pool & spa.
Negative_reviews: A little run down in the bathroom. No fridge provided. Experienced Smoke detector went off right after we turned on air conditioning at 27 degrees, the detector is placed way too close to the air-con.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Room itself was nice and for just over £100 was good value for an ideal location.
Negative_reviews: Grout on bathroom tiles around shower stained. Plaster stained in bathroom ceiling, could do with some maintenance.  Had to queue for breakfast and the food at the breakfast buffet was really poor.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews:
Swimming pool was good,
Being able to use your own content on TV was good, 
Afternoon tea was amazing 
Staff very helpful
Negative_reviews: No toilet brush in the bathroom
Title: Good

Positive_reviews: I liked the location for sure and the in room dinning menu was excellent. Good facilities in hotel.
Negative_reviews: For a four star category hotel, the rooms could have been better. We took a suite room but apart from size, nothing was impressing and the room was very impractical. The common room could have been much better too. eg. the door stopper of bathroom was positioned just outside the tub so you would alway land up stepping on it while walking out of bath tub and hurt your self. The height of the mini bar was high so it was difficult for people who are not tall to operate the kettle as it wasn't visible. The kettle itself was not very good and stable and burnt our hand with steam several times. The 2nd bathroom didn't have any soap dish to keep the soap bar. The shower water pipe was too small for us to use it as hand shower. The living room was very dark. The lighting could have been better. There were few lamps which couldn't be switched on as there was no power plug around it. There was only 1 remote for two television sets. The storage was not sufficient. There should have been storage with shelf but there was none. The storage in the living room had a big hole at its base so unusable. No tissue box in the room. etc etc.
Title: Good location & facility but room needs to be relooked into and should be more practical to use.

Positive_reviews: Really nice breakfast
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Convenient location for the castle and buses/train station. Hotel was good with comfy beds. Good selection of food at breakfast.
Title: Excellent location

Positive_reviews: Great location.
Negative_reviews: Upgraded to a better room, but wish we hadn't bothered. There were dirty stains on the carpet and furniture. The bathroom tiles were dirty and we were not impressed with the housekeeping.

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews:

Negative_reviews: Moldy bathroom , disinterested staff unless up selling rooms ... expect  way better from a Radisson blu .
Title: Would not 're vist

Negative_reviews: Corridors could be better cleaned
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: I liked the central location and exterior appeal of the hotel.  It is also near Waverley station and the old town.  The rest of the hotel failed to meet my expectations of a £280+ pn hotel.
Negative_reviews: One member of the reception staff was unfriendly.  The room was two single beds and not one large double bed.  It was also somewhat smaller than that in the pictures.  Noise from the street woke me.  There was a queue for breakfast and it was short staffed.
Title: Double bed was two singles, reception staff not polite, noise from main street.

Positive_reviews: The location
Negative_reviews:
Staff banging door outside our room , from 7am till 8-15am (approx20 times)
The door had private staff only , but it was awful.
We also had a smelly duvet, spoke to reception and it was sorted, 
This isn’t what we expect from the Radisson as this is our 5th stay here and have never had any complaints before
Title: Pleasant

Title: Feel The staff there are not to be trusted.

Positive_reviews: Location.
Negative_reviews: Arrival experience felt shambolic.  Had to call front desk on a couple of occasions to sort beds and also to locate our luggage.  Experience felt low grade to be honest which was disappointing since it was booked for a special occasion .  Won’t return.  Spent second night of our Edinburgh trip elsewhere.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Room was clean. Bed was comfortable. Breakfast was good and the staff were very accommodating.
Negative_reviews: The hotel was satisfactory. Our biggest complaint was the cost to stay. For the size of room and the amenities, like everything else, it was overpriced.
Title: Ideal location but expensive for what was offered.

Positive_reviews: The breakfast was nice, with a good range of food. The location was great.
Negative_reviews: Terrible value for money. The staff were very rude and unhelpful. The bedding in the room was shabby looking with tears in it. Bathroom was dirty with mould around the bath and the plug hole was stained. Far too expensive for what was to offer. The stools in the bar area were broken.
Title: Poor value for money!

Positive_reviews: The location is perfect!
Negative_reviews: There was a long queue for breakfast!
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Very comfy beds and amazing location
Negative_reviews:

Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: excellent location. very good breakfast. clean.
Negative_reviews: something was wrong with room A/C. The air was very dry. As a result I was not able to sleep well.
Title: Pleasant

Positive_reviews: Location, friendly staff
Negative_reviews: Too soft mattress. Had to ask for wash cloths—one of washcloths delivered was dirty.
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Concierge didn’t pick up phone, it went to voicemail. Not enough staff on reception, had to queue to both check out and check in. No bath robes or separate towels for using the pool. No USB charging points.
Title: Okay

Positive_reviews: Yummy breakfast. Cozy room.
Negative_reviews: Chromecast was available however wifi was not functioning. We were put in a room at the end of the hall which required some walking which made it tiring for us especially with our heavy luggages.
Title: great

Negative_reviews:
Poor mattresses, dirty room, couldn’t even arrange for bottle to be available in room despite 3 emails and paying £40 for it. 
Extortionate £265 for one night and doesn’t include breakfast
Title: Won’t stay again

Positive_reviews: Excellent location on Royal Mile, close to bars, attractions and eateries. Spacious room
Negative_reviews:
Superior room promised a view of Arthur's Seat, but this wasn't the case.
Headboard on bed was scuffed and dirty, while lock on room door looked to have previously been broken. No slippers, and bath robes only appeared in the room on the third day.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Hotel chosen for Location but also have stayed at Radison Hotels before and this one was a little disappointing compared with others ...Breakfast for example not up top the usual high standards.
Negative_reviews: Breakfast not up to usual high standard.

Positive_reviews: location, shopping

Title: Very Over  priced for average facilities

Positive_reviews: View from room. One staff member, Clare, went above and beyond to help resolve the many issues: broken lightbulb, internet not great, room vault had to be fixed, luggage not brought up after half hour so we went down to retrieve it ourselves, front desk wouldn’t answer five attempts to reach them in a row so had to go down elevator to reach someone; kitchen wouldn’t pick up at 9 at night even tho supposed to be open.
Negative_reviews: Bookings.com and Radisson Blu, Edinburgh didn’t appear to have my booking. I gave my reference number and apparently booking was under my son’s name and he’s a child. Then they said ‘we don’t have the room you booked but we will give you a better room’; then I discovered my credit card had been charged for the better room’s rate not the rate that had been confirmed for me on Bookings.com. I was overcharged by over 100 Great British Pounds!!! I will never use Bookings.com again to book anything.
Title: Some staff helpful; others not; terrible pillows; great views; booking screwups/overcharged.

Positive_reviews: Good position and clean
Negative_reviews: Water in bath wasnt hot. Booked a double room for me and ma wife a year in advance and got twin beds joined together and a room second floor when we asked for a higher room. Not good for nearly 300 pounds. Better in the Mercure.
Title: Fair

Positive_reviews: Location
Negative_reviews: Bedroom freezing, trying to switch on heating made no impact. No dressing gown or slippers, no in house movies
Title: Pleasant

Negative_reviews: Generally disappointed with stay - expected a better experience for the price we paid. Just wanted a nice quiet 3 night break, but Hotel was really busy as it was involved in hosting some Edinburgh Fringe events.
